cab.content: [This Document is the Property of His Britannic Majesty's Government.]Printed for the Cabinet. March 1922.ECRET.P. 3811.CABINET. I circulate to my colleagues the following telegram relating to the visit of therince of Wales to the Punjab. E. S. M. 7th March 1922. From Viceroy, 5th March 1922. Private and personal. Prince of Wales' visit to Punjab. All reports nowiceived ; complete unanimity manifested regarding the really excellent result ofsit. Private report from De Montmorency says best anywhere except perhapsurma. It is interesting in view of the natural anxiety regarding the visit to Delhiid Lahore.5230 100 3.22.
